mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point_charging_approval_result (point_charging_no, point_charging_director_no, point_charging_approval, point_charging_approval_date) VALUES ( #{pointChargingNo}, #{pointChargingDirectorNo}, 'F', NOW() )

INSERT INTO point_charging_approval_result (point_charging_no, point_charging_director_no, point_charging_approval, point_charging_approval_date) VALUES ( #{pointChargingNo}, #{pointChargingDirectorNo}, 'T', NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT point_charging_sum as pointChargingSum FROM point_charging WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
SELECT max(CAST(substring(point_charging_no,16) AS DECIMAL)) FROM point_charging
mapper.update: UPDATE point_charging SET point_charging_approval_result = 'T' WHERE point_charging_no = #{pointChargingNo}
mapper.select: SELECT a.point_charging_approval as pointChargingApproval, a.point_charging_approval_date as pointChargingApprovalDate, a.point_charging_director_no as pointChargingDirectorNo, b.point_charging_sum as pointChargingSum, b.point_charging_date as pointChargingDate, b.point_charging_no as pointChargingNo, c.member_name as memberName, c.member_id as memberId FROM point_charging_approval_result a INNER JOIN point_charging b ON a.point_charging_no = b.point_charging_no INNER JOIN member c ON b.member_no = c.member_no ORDER BY point_charging_approval_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}

SELECT a.point_charging_no as pointChargingNo, b.member_name as memberName, b.member_id as memberId, a.point_charging_sum as pointChargingSum, a.point_charging_date as pointChargingDate FROM point_charging a INNER JOIN member b ON a.member_no = b.member_no WHERE point_charging_approval_result = 'F' ORDER BY point_charging_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{pagePerRow}
